Safe Haven On A Dark NightBrave enough to take a peek at @Mr_Mega_Mango’s creepy castle?
黑夜中的避风港有胆量去看一眼 @Mr_Mega_Mango 的恐怖城堡么？
This beautiful yet ominous castle was created by @Mr_Mega_Mango as the spawn hub on his creative world.
      这个美丽而又不祥的城堡由 @Mr_Mega_Mango 创造，作为他创造世界的出生点。
We like to think of it as a mysterious castle found on a dark and stormy night. What kind of story could you write around this imposing build?

      我们更想把它想象成一个在风雨交加的夜晚中发现的神秘城堡。你能为这个壮观的建筑写出什么样的故事呢？
I’ll have a try! Our brave hero has lost their way. Pushing their way through an unknown forest, they’ve eaten the last of their food long ago. Hunger begins to press at their stomach. Even rotten flesh sounds pretty good right now.
      让我来试试！我们勇敢的英雄们迷路了，他们在陌生的森林中奋力前行，早已吃完了最后的食物。饥饿开始压迫他们的胃，甚至连腐肉现在听起来都相当不错。
Danger lurks in every shadow. Red glowing eyes here. A clatter of bones from over there. And a blood-chilling death groan from behind. A zombie? Or hopefully a villager who just stubbed his toe?
      危险潜伏在每一片阴影中，红色的眼睛在那里闪闪发光。骨头的碰撞声从那里传来，背后又响起一声毛骨悚然的死亡呻吟。是僵尸吗？或者只是一个被踩到脚趾头的村民？
The hero presses forward, narrowly avoiding danger at every turn. Squinting their eyes, desperately searching for a glimmer of light. Any shelter or sanctuary from the seemingly endless darkness.
      英雄们奋勇向前，而这里处处险象环生。他们眯起眼睛，绝望地寻求一丝光亮，试图从这仿佛永无止境的黑暗中找出任何一个庇护所或者安全区。
On their last heart, they emerge from the dense forest, and their eyes fall on the mysterious castle, its doors open wide.
      在他们只剩最后一颗心的时候，他们走出了茂密的森林，而他们的视线聚焦在了眼前这座神秘的城堡上，城堡的大门敞开着。
Dare you enter?
      你，敢进去吗？
